name: BL0CK Loop
description:
Make a loop to remove the space marked with dots.
Remove all the dots to level up !!!
Clear them in combo to gain bonus points.

● FEATURES
- Level System
- Combo Bonus
- Rotate, Eraser, Shuffle, and Continue items
- GameCenter Leaderboards

● REQUIREMENTS
- iOS 9.0 or later
- iPadOS 13.1 or later

● SUPPORT E-MAIL : support@sharpapp.com
